author: nick
msg: Tweak depends lines relating to compile-ooxml-xsds, so that the schema files are correctly downloaded if missing

author: nbubna
msg: since the test target cleans up the showcase war (for good reasons whose details i can't recall offhand), ensure the release target includes the showcase app anyway

author: odeakin
msg: Make sure that we use a consistent encoding across platforms, as getBytes() and String(byte[]) use the default platform encoding if it is not specified which causes these calls to fail on, for example, z/OS.
